com.riskybusiness

Class LuxAgentAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.riskybusiness.LuxAgentAdapter

  • public abstract class LuxAgentAdapter
extends Object

        The LuxAgentAdapter allows further agents to implement the methods they need to without worrying about gathering data from the game itself.

    Since:
    1.6
    See Also:
    LuxAgent

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Board board
      The Board the agent is in.
      protected Country[] countries
      The Country list that contains all of the countries on the board.
      protected String description
      A String used by subclassses to refer to it's description.
      protected int ID
      An integer that shows the ID given to the agent by the game.
      protected float version
      A float used by subclasses to refer to it's version number.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LuxAgentAdapter()
      An empty constructor to determine version number and description.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String description()
      A short description of this class as it relates to LuxDelux.
      String name()
      Tells the game what the class name of the object is.
      void setPrefs(int ID, Board board)
      This method should not be overridden, and allows this class to pass on the ID and Board from the game to the agent without having to worry about it themselves.
      float version()
      Tells the game what the current version of our AI is.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • LuxAgentAdapter

        public LuxAgentAdapter()

    • Method Detail

      • setPrefs

        public void setPrefs(int ID,
            Board board)

        This method should not be overridden, and allows this class to pass on the ID and Board from the game to the agent without having to worry about it themselves.

        Parameters:
        ID - The ID given to the agent by the game.
        board - The Board the agent is in.
        See Also:
        LuxAgent

      • name

        public String name()

        Tells the game what the class name of the object is. This is done by calling the current class's (represented as a Class object) Class.getName() method.

        Returns:
        The classname of this object.

      • version

        public float version()

        Tells the game what the current version of our AI is.

        Returns:
        The version float.

      • description

        public String description()

        A short description of this class as it relates to LuxDelux.

        Returns:
        The description string.
